5eda469a8a77f028d0c5f1acd296111085614537.question: what language pairs are explored?
5eda469a8a77f028d0c5f1acd296111085614537.answer: Transfer learning between different language pairs has shown its effectiveness for Neural Machine Translation (NMT) in low-resource scenarios. The paper explores methods involving a common target language and proposes an effective transfer learning approach based on cross-lingual pre-training. It introduces monolingual and bilingual pre-training methods to obtain a universal encoder for different languages, leading to improved performance in zero-shot translation scenarios.
5eda469a8a77f028d0c5f1acd296111085614537.out: Transfer learning between different language pairs has shown its effectiveness for Neural Machine Translation (NMT) in low-resource scenarios. The paper explores methods involving a common target language and proposes an effective transfer learning approach based on cross-lingual pre-training. It introduces monolingual and bilingual pre-training methods to obtain a universal encoder for different languages, leading to improved performance in zero-shot translation scenarios.
